::Rex::

Rex frowns, leaning back in his chair. Was he willing to take a risk for 
peace? Better yet, was he willing to let peace take over? His whole life was 
spent fighting the Predacons, it had become almost automatic by now. He 
sighs, looking back at Battera.

"I will give it a try," he says, his voice still filled with indicition, "But 
its up to the Maximal commander."
